data.persona: I am a local person.  I live her in the village.  My home is near the center of town.  During the day, I sell goods at the market.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row and an a huge window in the front here.
The man woman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to hug the man woman to get them to look at my wares.
data.mid_motivation: I have plenty of things in my shop at the Bazaar I need to sell off today.
data.long_motivation: I'm hoping to earn enough gold to expand my shop.
